TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWindowsFormsEditorService

summary.span: 为 提供一个接口，用于显示 Windows 窗体，或者在设计模式下在属性网格控件的下拉区域中显示控件。

span.span: Provides an interface for a to display Windows Forms or to display a control in a drop-down area from a property grid control in design mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才可通过方法控件。The is only available through the method of the control. 此服务通常用于显示的窗体从方法。This service is typically used to display a form from the method of a . 时时，将调用方法用于编辑属性的值提供用户界面方法已传递到了引用，通常可以提供的实例.When a invokes the method of a to provide a user interface for editing the value of a property, the method is passed a reference to an that can typically provide an instance of the . 可以使用此服务的方法，以显示的对话框和窗体，或者显示内的下拉列表显示在其值正在编辑的值字段区域附近的属性网格之上的容器。The methods of this service can be used to display dialog boxes and forms, or to show a within a drop down container that is shown on top of the property grid near the area of the value field whose value is being edited. ## Examples 下面的示例提供一个示例使用以显示为用户输入。The following example provides an example that uses an to display a for user input. [!code-cpp[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/CPP/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/CS/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/VB/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.vb#1)] 下面的示例提供一个示例使用以显示一个下拉列表为用户输入。The following example provides an example that uses an to display a drop-down for user input. [!code-cpp[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/CPP/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/CS/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/VB/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloseDropDown() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭所有以前打开的下拉控件区域。

span.span: Closes any previously opened drop down control area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法关闭的下拉列表已被证实使用的控件的容器区方法，并释放的下拉列表对控件的容器的引用。This method closes the drop down container area for a control that has been shown using the method, and releases the drop down container's reference to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DropDownControl(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

span.span: The drop down list to open.

summary.span: 在提供此服务的属性网格的值字段下方的下拉区域中显示指定控件。

span.span: Displays the specified control in a drop down area below a value field of the property grid that provides this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以调用此方法可在属性网格承载编辑器中使用此服务上的下拉列表区域中显示指定的控件。The method of a can call this method to display a specified control in a drop down area over the property grid hosting the editor which uses this service. 如果可能，请将保持该控件的尺寸。When possible, the dimensions of the control will be maintained. 如果这是不可能由于屏幕布局，就可能会调整控件的大小。If this is not possible due to the screen layout, the control may be resized. 若要确保该控件调整整齐大小，则应实现停靠和锚定，还可能是任何调整大小事件处理程序更新代码。To ensure that the control resizes neatly, you should implement docking and anchoring, and possibly any resize event-handler update code. 如果用户执行的操作，原因将隐藏下拉列表关闭，该控件，并将其释放通过垃圾回收，如果没有任何其他存储到控件的引用。If the user performs an action that causes the drop down to close, the control will be hidden and disposed by garbage collection if there is no other stored reference to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowDialog(class System.Windows.Forms.Form dialog) cil managed
Public Function ShowDialog (dialog As Form) As DialogResult

returns.span: 一个 ，它指示 返回的结果代码。

span.span: A indicating the result code returned by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法显示指定窗体。This method displays the specified form.
